message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible for you to consider lowering the price to $9,000? I believe this would be more in line with what I am able to offer at this time.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair price considering the value of this product for you.  Let me know if you're interested!

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible for you to consider $9,000 as a fair price for the product?
